entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
